Package BE

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
BE.Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Represents a camp entity with various details and functionalities.

      public Camp(String campName, ArrayList<String> dates, String registrationClosingDate, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, String description, Staff staffInCharge, int committeeSlots, boolean b, int committee_slots, int attendee_slots)
      Constructs a Camp object with provided details.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      dates - Dates associated with the camp.
      registrationClosingDate - Closing date for camp registration.
      userGroup - User group associated with the camp.
      location - Location of the camp.
      totalSlots - Total available slots for camp attendees.
      description - Description of the camp.
      staffInCharge - Staff member in charge of the camp.
      committeeSlots - Total available slots for camp committee members.
      b - Visibility status of the camp.
      committee_slots - Total available slots for camp committee members.
      attendee_slots - Total available slots for camp attendees.
